p: Lipid quantification and composition was determined for the validation samples at 96, 144 and 168 h. A one-way ANOVA was used to evaluate the effects of fermentation time on biomass yield and composition, lipid class and FA composition during the validation experiment. Generalized linear models from the statistical analysis system (version 9.4, SAS Institute Inc., Cary, NC, USA) were used and comparisons of least-square means were made by Tukey’s adjustment with the level of significance set at p < 0.05.
